          <title>
            <string language="en">Solids, liquids, and gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper, Flüssigkeiten und Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solides, liquides, et gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sólidos, líquidos, e gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solidi, liquidi e gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στερεά, υγρά, και αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sólidos, líquidos, y gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph shows how four kinds of substances change their states as the temperature is increased.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt, wie vier Arten 
Substanzänderung ihre Zustände als die Temperatur erhöht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre comment quatre 
genres de changement de substances leurs états à mesure que la 
température est augmentés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico de barra mostra como quatro tipos 
da mudança das substâncias seus estados como a temperatura são 
aumentados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico a strisce mostra come quattro 
generi di cambiamento delle sostanze loro dichiara mentre la 
temperatura è aumentata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση ράβδων επιδεικνύει πώς 
τέσσερα είδη ουσιών αλλάζουν τα κράτη τους καθώς η θερμοκρασία 
αυξάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de barra muestra cómo cuatro clases 
de cambio de las sustancias sus estados como la temperatura se 
aumentan.</string>
          </description>
